sentence: Stefanik is the third-ranking leader of the House Republican caucus, replacing Rep. Liz Cheney, R-Wyo., who angered the party with her denunciations of Trump after the Jan. 6 attack on the Capitol.
author: CHRIS MEGERIAN
title: Biden to confront the racism he's vowed to fight in visit to Buffalo after mass shooting
